tagline: We're not trying to replace Gord, we swear.*
body:
An [expert system](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Expert_system) for advising Brock CS students which courses to enroll in. Read our [full description](https://github.com/dideler/course-advisor/wiki).

### But wait, there's more!

* [Issue tracker](https://github.com/dideler/course-advisor/issues)
* [Contributors](https://github.com/dideler/course-advisor/contributors)
* [Work log](https://github.com/dideler/course-advisor/commits/master)
* [Wiki history](https://github.com/dideler/course-advisor/wiki/_history)

\* *Seriously. This expert system can be helpful, but it doesn't replace the pros. Seek Gord if you need real advice.*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Course Advisor
